channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: "美国现在和将来都是保护主义"。法国财政部长布鲁诺-勒梅尔称，无论谁赢得总统大选，美国的保护主义都将继续，他呼吁欧洲在贸易问题上采取强硬立场
item.description:
"America is and will remain protectionist.” French Finance Minister Bruno Le Maire says US protectionism will continue whoever wins the presidential election as he called on Europe to take a tough stance on trade https://t.co/5XZOZncmJq

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 美国银行首席执行官布莱恩-莫伊尼汉表示，银行业需要时间解决商业房地产贷款问题
item.description:
It’ll take time for the banking industry to work through issues with commercial real estate loans, says Bank of America CEO Brian Moynihan https://t.co/4vSUmDrC6v

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 美国和欧洲之间的贸易就像詹姆斯-邦德的马提尼酒一样--摇而不搅--经受住了再全球化的考验
item.description:
Trade between the US and Europe is withstanding re-globalization with all the stiffness of James Bond’s martinis — shaken, not stirred https://t.co/rP7Dytj0iI

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 菲律宾总统小费迪南德-马科斯表示，中国在南海的威胁与日俱增，但菲律宾不会通过 "捅熊 "来挑起冲突。
item.description:
China's threat is growing in the South China Sea, but the Philippines won't start a conflict by “poking the bear,” says President Ferdinand Marcos Jr https://t.co/1LDmaVBMT1

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 海外投资降至历史最低点后，中国国务院发布进一步向外国企业开放中国市场的行动计划
item.description:
China’s State Council releases action plan to further open up the Chinese market to foreign firms after overseas investment falls to record lows https://t.co/UGRM6FIB7h

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 网上汽车拍卖有了新平台。此外，还有对新款梅赛德斯-AMG G63 的评测。一切尽在本周的《Hot Pursuit！》播客：
item.description:
There's a new platform for online car auctions.
Plus, a review of the new Mercedes-AMG G63.
It's all in this week's Hot Pursuit! podcast: https://t.co/4NF5ZFPbc6

— Bloomberg Radio (@BloombergRadio) March 18, 2024

item.title: 随着欧洲上市步伐的加快，德国香水零售商道格拉斯预计将把其 9.07 亿欧元的首次公开募股定价定在区间底部
item.description:
German perfume retailer Douglas is expected to price its €907 million IPO at the bottom of the range, as European listings pick up pace https://t.co/ApcPZcSFFT

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 由于对巴勒斯坦工人的禁令，以色列的建筑工地处于闲置状态。这使以色列的风向标建筑业变成了危机中心
item.description:
Building sites in Israel are idle due to a ban on Palestinian workers.

That's turned its bellwether construction industry into a crisis epicenter https://t.co/9TQeXau2IN

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 计算机服务器制造商超微计算机公司将公开发售 200 万股普通股
item.description:
Computer server maker Super Micro Computer is offering to sell 2 million shares of common stock in a public offering https://t.co/LYdG4mJkF8

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 英国对冲基金交易员在法庭上表示，他从丹麦税务机关获得超过 90 亿克朗（约合 13 亿美元）的股息退税时没有做错任何事
item.description:
British hedge fund trader says in court that he did nothing wrong when receiving more than 9 billion kroner ($1.3 billion) in dividend tax refunds from Denmark's tax authorities https://t.co/0b6gZaoCa6

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 瑞士国家银行表示不会因环境原因而改变其巨额外汇储备的投资方式，回绝了要求其对气候变化采取更积极立场的呼声
item.description:
The SNB says won’t change how it invests its huge foreign-currency reserves for environmental reasons, rebuffing calls for it to take a more active stance on climate change https://t.co/jW4zzlVtY9

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 欧元区劳动力成本的增长在 2024 年底放缓，这一结果可能会给欧洲央行的决策者带来鼓舞，因为他们正在研究工资水平的强弱，并将其作为决定何时降息的关键因素之一
item.description:
Euro-area labor-cost increases slowed at the end of 2024, an outcome that is likely to provide encouragement for ECB policymakers who are studying the strength of wages as a key input for their decision on when to cut rates https://t.co/RuMNVC4JvE

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 参议员伊丽莎白-沃伦（Elizabeth Warren）敦促美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）降低利率，帮助陷入困境的清洁能源企业
item.description:
Senator Elizabeth Warren urges Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell to cut interest rates to help struggling clean energy https://t.co/P6KEcuPcnM

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 日本央行结束了现代史上最激进的货币刺激计划，取消了世界上最后一个负利率和一系列非常规工具，但进一步加息的方向仍不明朗。
item.description:
The Bank of Japan ended the most aggressive monetary stimulus program in modern history, scrapping the world’s last negative interest rate and a raft of unconventional tools, while leaving the course of additional hikes unclear https://t.co/d4shghCNQ1

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 一种用于押注高风险房地产项目的不起眼的投资产品正面临着前所未有的压力--这预示着商业地产市场即将面临的痛苦
item.description:
An obscure investment product used to bet on risky real estate projects is facing unprecedented stress — a sign of pain to come for the commercial property market https://t.co/3jVCNuMpn6

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: Blackstone 亿万富翁 Tony James 的家族办公室成立私募股权投资公司，为全球其他超级富豪成员争取投资公司
item.description:
Blackstone billionaire Tony James' family office starts private equity firm to court investment firms for other members of the world’s super-rich https://t.co/RxlM6GuNgF

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 包括意大利亿万富翁阿涅利家族在内的投资者收购了深受意大利青少年喜爱的女装品牌 Subdued 的股份
item.description:
Investors including Italy’s billionaire Agnelli family buy a stake in women’s fashion brand Subdued, popular with Italian teens https://t.co/QCIfcCZyvN

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 日本央行 17 年来首次加息，"YOLO "一族打赌本周英伟达（Nvidia）的价值可能翻番。以下是市场动向。
item.description:
The BOJ hikes for the first time in 17 years and the YOLO crowd bet Nvidia could double in value this week. Here’s what’s moving markets. https://t.co/v9VaHI2jvn

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）警告说，乌干达禁止同性恋的严苛法律正在削弱外国直接投资并损害旅游业
item.description:
Uganda’s harsh law outlawing homosexuality is undermining foreign direct investment and harming tourism, warns the IMF https://t.co/GGDuatQASY

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 央行加息后，日元下跌超过 1%，接近年内最弱水平
item.description:
Japan's yen falls more than 1%, nearing the weakest level for the year, after the central banks rate hike move https://t.co/eag86G8bq0

— Bloomberg (@business) March 19, 2024

item.title: 尼日利亚央行行长奥拉耶米-卡多佐（Olayemi Cardoso）投票赞成比上个月更大幅度地提高利率
item.description:
Nigerian central bank Governor Olayemi Cardoso voted for an even larger interest-rate increase than was delivered last month https://t.co/GW9dvxKxA6

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 阿达尼绿色公司尚未收到美国司法部的通知，尽管它知道美国司法部正在对可能违反美国反腐败法的行为进行调查。
item.description:
Adani Green has not received a notice from the US Department of Justice although it is aware that an investigation is underway for potential violations of American anti-corruption laws https://t.co/ekdNin6cRO

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 美联储本周将开始深入讨论其资产负债表，包括何时以及如何放缓资产流失
item.description:
The Fed will begin in-depth talks about its balance sheet this week, including when and how to slow its asset runoff https://t.co/Hd9WKCAtWG

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 据消息人士透露，越南共产党领导人将在周三的会议上讨论并决定国家主席武文通（Vo Van Thuong）的辞职事宜。
item.description:
Vietnam’s Communist Party leaders will discuss and decide on the resignation of President Vo Van Thuong at a meeting on Wednesday, according to sources https://t.co/XvFS8MsETn

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 其中一个最大的问题是，藏在海外的一大笔钱将如何处理，这些资产包括美国政府债券、欧洲发电站和新加坡股票。
item.description:
One of the biggest questions is what happens to that big ball of money stashed overseas in assets including US government bonds, European power stations and Singapore equities https://t.co/llM6qx6BOc

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 宾利的客户对每辆新车的装饰和特殊表面处理的要求不断超出预期
item.description:
Bentley's clientele keeps exceeding expectations for how many flourishes and special finishes they want on each new ride https://t.co/kbwKpNfYDF

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 由于年初物价增长疲软，瑞士政府下调了通胀预期，这一证据可能支持瑞士央行本周提前下调通胀预期
item.description:
Switzerland’s government cuts its inflation forecast owing to weaker price growth at the start of the year, a piece of evidence that could support an earlier-than-expected cut from the SNB this week https://t.co/hA9DyfWnTW

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 一家加密货币交易所正在调查昨天比特币跌至 8,900 美元的闪电崩盘事件
item.description:
A crypto exchange is investigating a flash crash that sent Bitcoin down to $8,900 yesterday https://t.co/17o5Eszq7I

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 韩国金融机构承诺在本十年结束前为旨在帮助韩国实现气候目标的项目提供 3130 亿美元的资金
item.description:
South Korean financial institutions have pledged to provide $313 billion through the end of the decade for projects aimed at helping the country meet its climate goals https://t.co/LtL5TFi2Lv

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 去年华尔街的平均奖金下降了 2%，降至 17.65 万美元，为 2019 年以来的最低水平
item.description:
The average Wall Street bonus dropped 2% to $176,500 last year, the lowest since 2019 https://t.co/Qc2OSHIdVj

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024
